    • locationFormatter

      public net.kyori.adventure.text.Component locationFormatter(String message, org.bukkit.Location location)
      Parses the message component for the given string and location.
      Uses the 'NONE', 'LOCATION_X', 'LOCATION_Y', and 'LOCATION_Z' locale messages
      Uses the placeholders "value" for the coordinate numbers, and "location" for the final location message insertion
      Parameters:
      message - String
      location - Location
      Returns:
      Component

    • timeFormatter

      public net.kyori.adventure.text.Component timeFormatter(String message, Long timeDifferenceInSeconds)
      Parses the message component for the given string and time difference in seconds
      Uses the 'NEVER', 'HOUR', 'MINUTE', 'SECOND', 'AGO', and 'JUST_NOW' locale messages
      Uses the placeholders "value" for the time amounts, and "time" for the final time message insertion
      Parameters:
      message - String
      timeDifferenceInSeconds - Long
      Returns:
      Component

    • villagerInventoryComponentBuilder

      public net.kyori.adventure.text.Component villagerInventoryComponentBuilder(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory)
      Parses the message component for the given Inventory
      Uses the 'VILLAGER_INVENTORY', 'EMPTY', and 'INVENTORY_CONTENTS' locale messages
      Uses the placeholders "item" for the name of the item, "value" for how many of the item there is.
      Item names are run through titleCaseConversion() before being parsed into the component
      Uses the placeholder "contents" for the final inventory message component insertion
      Parameters:
      inventory - Inventory
      Returns:
      Component

    • parseSingleValue

      public net.kyori.adventure.text.Component parseSingleValue(String message, String value)
      Parses a message component for a given string and value
      Uses the placeholder "value" for the supplied value
      Parameters:
      message - String
      value - String
      Returns:
      Component

      Parameters:
